name: Merge Dice - Puzzle Game 5x5
description:
MERGE DICE: PUZZLE GAME 5x5 has all the features of a great puzzle block game that is fun and pleasurable for all ages and skill levels. This game is also simple to play and highly addictive while offering a brain-boosting challenge.

All you need to do now is check out this amazing puzzle featuring different colorful wooden dice that make it more exciting to solve!

The game is free to play. In this game, you can rotate pieces to match three or more dice with the same number in a row, either horizontally or vertically, then merge the blocks and play for hours with addicting logic puzzles. The bigger combo that you create and collect, the higher score you get. Try it and you will love this MERGE DICE: PUZZLE GAME 5x5.

*** HOW TO PLAY ***
● Rotate the dice if you want before placing it.
● Drag the wooden dice block to move them.
● Match three or more dice with the same number, then the dice will be merged and you get points.
● The game will be over if there is no room to put dice.

*** HIGHLIGHT FEATURES ***
● Beautiful colorful wooden dice blocks.
● Sweet sounds effects.
● Rotate & Foreseen feature.
● Powerful boosters.
● No time limit & No internet needed.
● Easy to learn with a tutorial.
● Support leaderboards.
● Totally free.

MERGE DICE: PUZZLE GAME 5x5 trains your analytical thinking skills as it requires real skill to set the highest score.
Are you up for it? We really hope you enjoy playing the game!
